html:
Al Yusr International LLC

Contracting Division

From,
Name of Employee {{doc.name}}
Emp.No {{doc.attendance_device_id}}
Trade.{%- if doc.trade -%}{doc.trade} {%- endif -%}
Project Name.
Date-{{doc.date_of_joining}}

To,
The Project Manager
Al Ansari Trading Enterprise LLC.

Subject:- Withdraw My Resignation

Dear Sir,

With reference to the above Subject, I Would like to inform you that kindly withdraw my resignation letter I shall be very thank full for that.

So, requested to you please withdraw my resignation Letter by looking my performance and sincere work.

Reason of Withdrawal

Visa Renewal Feedback(if Applicable)



Thanks & Regards
{% set user_doc = frappe.get_doc('User', frappe.session.user) %} {%- if user_doc.email_signature -%}
Signature {{user_doc.email_signature}}
{%- endif -%}
Emp.No {{doc.attendance_device_id}}
Trade {%- if doc.trade -%}{doc.trade} {%- endif -%}
GSM
name: Resignation Withdraw letter
